doc.after: Aeroflot also performed other functions including aeromedical crop dusting heavy lifting for the Soviet Space Agency offshore oil platform support exploration for natural resources support for construction projects transport of military troops and supplies as an adjunct to the Soviet Air Force atmospheric research and remote area patrol It operated hundreds of helicopters and cargo aircraft in addition to civil airliners It also operated the Soviet equivalent of a presidential aircraft and other VIP transports of government and communist party officials 6 11 94
